markdownRemark.html: Blossom is open all year round, during the summer holidays, Easter and Christmas. They offer camps for children between 0 and 12 years of age. Bilingual childcare centre with activities designed to improve balance, coordination and other sensory stimuli while reinforcing social skills in a group play environment.

frontmatter.title: Blossom

frontmatter.address: Camino del Águila Real, 2, 11130 Chiclana de la Frontera, Cádiz
